committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: To amend the Low-Level Radioactive Waste Policy Amendments Act of 1985 to remove class C waste from the low-level program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Low-Level Radioactive Waste Policy Amendments Act of 1991

summary.text: Low-Level Radioactive Waste Policy Amendments Act of 1991 - Amends the Low-Level Radioactive Waste Policy Act to remove class C waste from the low-level program. Directs the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to issue regulations governing the siting of low-level radioactive waste disposal facilities, including requirements that any candidate site be located: (1) in a low population density area with estimated limited future population growth potential; and (2) at least five kilometers from the residential property limits of the nearest urban community at the time of site selection and from schools and other facilities primarily serving children.

titles.title: Low-Level Radioactive Waste Policy Amendments Act of 1991
To amend the Low-Level Radioactive Waste Policy Amendments Act of 1985 to remove class C waste from the low-level program, and for other purposes.
